inclusion.criterion: no permeation of surrounding fat planes
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: no encasement of major vascular structures
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: no distant metastases or peritoneal infiltration
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: colectomy including another part of the colon
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 17-year-old boy with severe migratory pain in right lower quadrant, nausea and vomiting. CT scan showed acute perforated appendicitis.
